author: mpricehip2save
title: Amazon: The Night Before Paperback Books Just $2.01 (Regularly $4.99)
text:
What fun gift ideas for kids! Head over to Amazon.com and grab a variety of different paperback books from the popular The Night Before series for as little as $2.01…
The Night Before My Birthday $2.01 (regularly $4.99)
The Night Before Kindergarten $2.01 (regularly $4.99)
The Night Before Preschool $2.01 (regularly $4.99)
The Night Before Class Picture Day $2.74 (regularly $4.99)

The Night Before the 100th Day of School $2.01 (regularly $4.99)
The Night Before Mother’s Day $2.01 (regularly $4.99)
The Night Before Father’s Day $1.97 (regularly $4.99)
Get free shipping on a $35 order, a $25 Book order OR snag free 2-day shipping on ANY size order with Amazon Prime (you can sign up for a FREE 30-day trial here ). OR, choose free no-rush shipping and get a $5.99 credit for Prime Pantry OR a $1 credit for eBooks & more – may vary by user.
(Thanks, Bologna!)
